alert.note: Alert for Jackson Hole; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 11 at 2:18PM MST until December 12 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Periods of snow. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches in Jackson Valley; 5 to 10 inches in the mountains, with locally higher amounts up to 14 inches in the Teton Mountains. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph in the mountains. * WHERE...Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains and Jackson Hole. * WHEN...Until 11 PM Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult, especially over Teton and Togwotee Passes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Please monitor the Bridger-Teton Avalanche Center at JHAVALANCHE.ORG, if your plans include travel into the back country. Back country enthusiasts can easily become disoriented and lost. Frostbite and hypothermia can set in quickly.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Jackson Hole; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains
